name: Creamy Irish Potato Soup
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: This rich and creamy potato soup is subtly flavored with celery and green onions.  It's the kind of soup you'll want to savor slowly...even though it's ready in just 35 minutes.
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups Swanson® Chicken Broth or Swanson® Certified Organic Chicken Broth or Swanson® Natural Goodness® Chicken Broth
3 medium potatoes, peeled and sliced 1/4 inch thick
directions: Heat the butter in a 3-quart saucepan over medium heat
Add onions and celery and cook until tender
Stir the broth, 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper and potatoes in the saucepan and heat to a boil
Cover and cook for 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender
Place half of the broth mixture and half of the milk in a blender or food processor
Repeat with the remaining broth mixture and remaining milk
Return to the saucepan and heat through
